lines.text: Good evening everyone, I'm Alex Nakamoto and welcome to Hermes TV. We've got massive news tonight.
And I'm Maya Torres. That's right Alex — Bitcoin has officially crossed two hundred thousand dollars for the first time in history.
Two hundred K! The bull case just keeps getting stronger. On-chain metrics are absolutely insane right now.
Hold on. Let's look at the data before we get carried away. The surge was driven by a twelve percent jump in twenty-four hours, mostly institutional buying.
Exactly! The ETF inflows are record-breaking. BlackRock alone moved billions this week.
Meanwhile, Ethereum is up eight percent and Solana jumped fifteen. The whole market is moving.
And this is just the beginning. We'll be watching this very closely. Stay with Hermes TV.
